title: Champion idea: Donald Trump, The President
body:
Passive: Capitalism

The Donald and his teammates receive increased starting gold and 50 bonus gold/second.

Q: Yuge Member

The Donald swings his ginormous manhood in an arc around him, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies. Deals double damage and 99% slow to ethnic minorities.

W: Leader's Speech

The Donald delivers an inspiring speech, granting all allies increased movement speed, attack speed and patriotism. 

E: You're Fired!

The Donald terminates the employment of a target enemy, dealing damage and publicly humiliating them. For the rest of the match the targeted player can no longer recall back to base and cannot kill minions.

Ultimate: BUILD A WALL

The Donald builds a wall across the entire map that prevents the enemy mexicans from reaching the nexus and cripples their economy, eliminating all passive gold income.
